title: Designing Motivation Strategies in Multimedia Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Case-based learning environment emphasizing practical applicability by current professionals

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the impact of motivational elements in multimedia materials on cognitive load.
Learners can design motivational strategies (e.g., engaging graphics, challenging scenarios) to promote generative processing.
Learners can utilize tools to evaluate the balance between learner motivation and cognitive load in blended environments.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
